summary:
Ever felt like you wanted a weapon that gets more powerful as you use it to kill things?
<br />
<br />Then this may be for you! This mod adds in a set of weapons that get more powerful when you kill un-dead with them, in addition to bonus damage against un-dead creatures

[u][center][size=5][color=Red]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u]
If you have ever wanted a weapon that gets stronger as you kill things, then this may be the mod for you!

This mod adds a set of weapons into the game for the stout un-dead hunter, weapons that deal extra damage to any un-dead creature, they also have a unique property in that they gain in strength and power the more un-dead you kill - this damage increase is for the weapon as a whole, not just against the un-dead!

[u][center][size=5][color=Red]Manual Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u]
To manually install this mod, extract the contents of the archive you downloaded into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u][center][size=5][color=Red]Manual Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u]
To uninstall this mod manually, delete the .esp file for this mod and make sure you delete all of the scripts that came with the mod as well.

[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Future Plans[/color][/size][/center][/u]
Do this kind of weapon for other creatures as well, as well as update my dragon killing weapons of the same kind
